name: Castle Blaster 2D!
description:
Castle Blaster is easy to play but hard to master, and  rewards players for frequently switching to the right weapons at the right time.

Play as the King's greatest soldier to defend your King and his Castle from his greatest  arch enemy! Your King's  arch enemy's castle is slowly starting to wear down due to damage from previous battles. This has made him pick on even weaker Kingdoms than before, so that he can maintain his large Castle by stealing their gold and defeating them. Your King's precious Castle took 19 years to build and he has you equipped with the most powerful futuristic weapons on Earth. Don't let your king down! 

-There are 3 unique weapons, with each having their own strengths and weaknesses, but these weapons can be used to combo in order to  overcome/mitigate their weaknesses.

-Castle Blaster has 4 interesting maps just for you, you can battle your enemy into the middle of the wilderness, fight next to scorching hot lava, or freezing low temperatures in the cosmos.

-200 challenging unlocked levels that get harder and longer as you advance,  as well as a beginner, advance, tricky, nightmare, and hell as difficulties!

-Players can also try out the challenging endless (wave) mode, with each wave lasting 5 minutes/300 seconds, and +5000 hp on each wave, how long can you last? 

                                                                                                                                 Instructions
Use your weapons to blast the Enemy's castle before he blast and destroys you.  Use your 1,2, or 3 keys to swap weapons, and aim with the mouse.

The futuristic Grenade Launcher can penetrate multiple bullets and is able to ricochet off the Enemy's Castle, it's best used against crowds, BOSS bullets (red bullets),  and bursting down the Enemy's Castle.

You can swap to the Bow by clicking  "3" on your keyboard, this weapon is great at slowly decelerating the BOSS bullets, defending your tower from Blue Bandits (blue bullets), and can be used to clear crowds of grey bullets in a single burst (at close range) due to its large projectile size. 

The HMG is your main weapon and is one of the least situational weapons you have,  Its reliability is unbeatable, and performs decently/well in just about all situations,  but despite how reliable the HMG is, it should not be used for everything.
